category: news
title: "India’s logistics SaaS startup FarEye bags $13 million"
excerpt: "More than 150 e-commerce and delivery companies globally use an Indian logistics startup’s service to work out the optimum way to ship items to their customers. That startup, Noida-based FarEye, said today it has raised an additional $13 million to close its Series D financing round at $37."
